targets.queryText: SELECT DISTINCT station_id, neighborhood, city, latitude, longitude, station_id || ' (' || city || ')' as locationName, temperature as _value FROM weather_observations WHERE timestamp >= datetime('now', '-1 hour') ORDER BY station_id
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT DISTINCT station_id, neighborhood, city, latitude, longitude, station_id || ' (' || city || ')' as locationName, temperature as _value FROM weather_observations WHERE timestamp >= datetime('now', '-1 hour') ORDER BY station_id

targets.queryText:
SELECT temperature as value 
FROM weather_observations 
WHERE station_id LIKE '%${station_id}%' 
    AND city LIKE '%${city}%' 
ORDER BY timestamp DESC 
LIMIT 1

FROM weather_observations

targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 * 300 as time, 'Average Temperature' as series, AVG(temperature) as value FROM weather_observations WHERE station_id LIKE '%IMONTR178%' AND city LIKE '%Montreal%' AND CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) >= 1752346079784 / 1000 AND CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) < 1752432479784 / 1000 GROUP BY CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 ORDER BY time
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 * 300 as time, 'Average Temperature' as series, AVG(temperature) as value FROM weather_observations WHERE station_id LIKE '%${station_id}%' AND city LIKE '%${city}%' AND CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) >= $__from / 1000 AND CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) < $__to / 1000 GROUP BY CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 ORDER BY time

targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 * 300 as time, 'Average Humidity' as series, AVG(humidity) as value FROM weather_observations WHERE station_id LIKE '%%%' AND city LIKE '%Saint-Eustache%' AND CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) >= 1752285365862 / 1000 AND CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) < 1752371765862 / 1000 GROUP BY CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 ORDER BY time

targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 * 300 as time, 'Average Pressure' as series, AVG(pressure) as value FROM weather_observations WHERE station_id LIKE '%${station_id}%' AND city LIKE '%${city}%' AND CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) >= $__from / 1000 AND CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) < $__to / 1000 GROUP BY CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 ORDER BY time
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 * 300 as time, 'Average Pressure' as series, AVG(pressure) as value FROM weather_observations WHERE station_id LIKE '%${station_id}%' AND city LIKE '%${city}%' AND CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) >= $__from / 1000 AND CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) < $__to / 1000 GROUP BY CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 ORDER BY time

targets.queryText:
WITH pressure_series AS (
  SELECT 
    CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 * 300 AS time,
    AVG(pressure) AS value
  FROM weather_observations
  WHERE 
    station_id LIKE '%${station_id}%' AND
    city LIKE '%${city}%' AND
    CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) >= $__from / 1000 AND 
    CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) < $__to / 1000
  GROUP BY time
)

SELECT 
  curr.time,
  'ΔPressure (30 min)' AS series,
  curr.value - prev.value AS value
FROM pressure_series curr
JOIN pressure_series prev ON curr.time = prev.time + 7200
ORDER BY curr.time
targets.rawQueryText:
WITH pressure_series AS (
  SELECT 
    CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 * 300 AS time,
    AVG(pressure) AS value
  FROM weather_observations
  WHERE 
    station_id LIKE '%${station_id}%' AND
    city LIKE '%${city}%' AND
    CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) >= $__from / 1000 AND 
    CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) < $__to / 1000
  GROUP BY time
)

SELECT 
  curr.time,
  'ΔPressure (30 min)' AS series,
  curr.value - prev.value AS value
FROM pressure_series curr
JOIN pressure_series prev ON curr.time = prev.time + 7200
ORDER BY curr.time

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
    CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 * 300 as time, 
    'Average UV Index' as series, 
    AVG(uv_index) as value 
FROM weather_observations 
WHERE station_id LIKE '%${station_id}%' 
    AND city LIKE '%${city}%' 
    AND CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) >= $__from / 1000 
    AND CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) < $__to / 1000 
GROUP BY CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 
ORDER BY time
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
    CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 * 300 as time, 
    'Average UV Index' as series, 
    AVG(uv_index) as value 
FROM weather_observations 
WHERE station_id LIKE '%${station_id}%' 
    AND city LIKE '%${city}%' 
    AND CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) >= $__from / 1000 
    AND CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) < $__to / 1000 
GROUP BY CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 
ORDER BY time

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
    CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 * 300 as time, 
    'Average solar radiation' as series, 
    AVG(solar_radiation) as value 
FROM weather_observations 
WHERE station_id LIKE '%${station_id}%' 
    AND city LIKE '%${city}%' 
    AND CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) >= $__from / 1000 
    AND CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) < $__to / 1000 
GROUP BY CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 
ORDER BY time
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
    CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 * 300 as time, 
    'Average solar radiation' as series, 
    AVG(solar_radiation) as value 
FROM weather_observations 
WHERE station_id LIKE '%${station_id}%' 
    AND city LIKE '%${city}%' 
    AND CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) >= $__from / 1000 
    AND CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) < $__to / 1000 
GROUP BY CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 
ORDER BY time

panels.description: The "drying power" of the air, useful to understand plants needs

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 * 300 AS time,
  'VPD (kPa)' AS series,
  (
    0.6108 * EXP((17.27 * temperature) / (temperature + 237.3)) -
    0.6108 * EXP((17.27 * dewpoint) / (dewpoint + 237.3))
  ) AS value
FROM weather_observations
WHERE 
  timestamp >= datetime('now', '-24 hours') AND
  temperature IS NOT NULL AND
  dewpoint IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 * 300 AS time,
  'VPD (kPa)' AS series,
  (
    0.6108 * EXP((17.27 * temperature) / (temperature + 237.3)) -
    0.6108 * EXP((17.27 * dewpoint) / (dewpoint + 237.3))
  ) AS value
FROM weather_observations
WHERE 
  timestamp >= datetime('now', '-24 hours') AND
  temperature IS NOT NULL AND
  dewpoint IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Vapor Pressure Deficit

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
  date(timestamp) AS time,
  'Daily Solar Energy (kWh/m²)' AS series,
  SUM(solar_radiation * 300.0 / 3600000.0) AS value
FROM weather_observations
WHERE 
  timestamp >= datetime('now', '-7 days') AND
  solar_radiation IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
  date(timestamp) AS time,
  'Daily Solar Energy (kWh/m²)' AS series,
  SUM(solar_radiation * 300.0 / 3600000.0) AS value
FROM weather_observations
WHERE 
  timestamp >= datetime('now', '-7 days') AND
  solar_radiation IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 3600 * 3600 AS time,
  'ET₀ (mm/h)' AS series,
  (
    0.408 * (solar_radiation * 3600 / 1000000.0) + 
    (900 / (temperature + 273)) * wind_speed *
    (0.6108 * EXP((17.27 * temperature) / (temperature + 237.3)) - 
     0.6108 * EXP((17.27 * dewpoint) / (dewpoint + 237.3))) / 
    (temperature + 273)
  ) AS value
FROM weather_observations
WHERE 
  timestamp >= datetime('now', '-24 hours') AND
  temperature IS NOT NULL AND
  dewpoint IS NOT NULL AND
  solar_radiation IS NOT NULL AND
  wind_speed IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 3600 * 3600 AS time,
  'ET₀ (mm/h)' AS series,
  (
    0.408 * (solar_radiation * 3600 / 1000000.0) + 
    (900 / (temperature + 273)) * wind_speed *
    (0.6108 * EXP((17.27 * temperature) / (temperature + 237.3)) - 
     0.6108 * EXP((17.27 * dewpoint) / (dewpoint + 237.3))) / 
    (temperature + 273)
  ) AS value
FROM weather_observations
WHERE 
  timestamp >= datetime('now', '-24 hours') AND
  temperature IS NOT NULL AND
  dewpoint IS NOT NULL AND
  solar_radiation IS NOT NULL AND
  wind_speed IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 * 300 AS time,
  'Cloud Base Height (m)' AS series,
  125.0 * (temperature - dewpoint) AS value
FROM weather_observations
WHERE 
  timestamp >= datetime('now', '-24 hours') AND
  temperature IS NOT NULL AND
  dewpoint IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 * 300 AS time,
  'Cloud Base Height (m)' AS series,
  125.0 * (temperature - dewpoint) AS value
FROM weather_observations
WHERE 
  timestamp >= datetime('now', '-24 hours') AND
  temperature IS NOT NULL AND
  dewpoint IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.description: The closer the temperature is to the convective temperature, the more convection can happen aloft. If the temperature and the convective temperature crosses, there is ground convection

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 * 300 AS time,
  'Convective Temperature (°C)' AS series,
  dewpoint + 13.0 AS convective_temperature
FROM weather_observations
WHERE 
  timestamp >= datetime('now', '-24 hours') AND
  dewpoint IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 * 300 AS time,
  'Convective Temperature (°C)' AS series,
  dewpoint + 13.0 AS convective_temperature
FROM weather_observations
WHERE 
  timestamp >= datetime('now', '-24 hours') AND
  dewpoint IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 * 300 AS time,
  'Surface Temperature (°C)' AS series,
  temperature AS temperature
FROM weather_observations
WHERE 
  timestamp >= datetime('now', '-24 hours') AND
  temperature IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', timestamp) AS INTEGER) / 300 * 300 AS time,
  'Surface Temperature (°C)' AS series,
  temperature AS temperature
FROM weather_observations
WHERE 
  timestamp >= datetime('now', '-24 hours') AND
  temperature IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time
